channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Ancient Penis Worm With Rings of Sharp Teeth Has Been Discovered in the Grand Canyon
item.description: The 500-million-year-old fossil, containing a species named in honor of the krayt dragons in Star Wars, is a much larger ancestor of phallic marine wo...

item.title: Spotify’s latest feature lets you add your own transitions to playlists
item.description: The new options are designed to appeal to playlist experts and other music fans, who have collectively created nearly 9 billion playlists on Spotify's...

item.title: OpenAI launches a sub-$5 ChatGPT plan in India
item.description: This plan will offer 10x more messages and image generation than the free tier, among other benefits.

item.title: Canon Promo Codes: 10% Off | August 2025
item.description: Save 10%, plus over $900 on cameras, lenses, and more with today’s Canon coupons for new and refurbished tech.

item.title: SoftBank makes $2B investment in Intel
item.description: SoftBank will pay $23 per share for Intel common stock.

item.title: AT&T Promo Code: Get Up to $300 in August
item.description: Whether you’re looking to upgrade your internet or get the latest phone, we’ve got you covered with our selection of AT&T coupons and deals.

item.title: Eight Sleep raises $100M to expand its AI-powered sleep tech
item.description: The sleep tech company raised from HSG, Valor Equity Partners, Founders Fund, Y Combinator and big F1 names like Charles Leclerc and Zak Brown.

item.title: The West Texas Measles Outbreak Has Ended
item.description: According to state health officials, a measles outbreak that started in an undervaccinated community and killed two children is now over.

item.title: An Account Using the Same Name as Trump’s BLS Pick Posted Red-Pilled Conspiracy Theories
item.description: A WIRED review of a now deleted Twitter account that used the screen name “Dr. Erwin J. Antoni III” shows it posted conspiratorial content about the 2...

item.title: Allianz Life data breach affects 1.1 million customers
item.description: Data breach notification site Have I Been Pwned notified 1.1 million customers of a July data breach, a number not previously reported.
